data.message: Years later, they'd go back and re-rate it And call the Slim Shady LP the greatest The Marshall Mathers was a classic The Eminem Show was fantastic But Encore just didn't have the caliber to match it. please Em 1 concert in India atleast

replies.message: Encore was awesome,  it gave birth to the song puke.  What better way to tell someone they're a piece of shit,  than by telling them you want to puke evrytime you think of them
Bruh Encore was lit too, that was just a line from the song "be careful what you wish for".
so be careful what you wish for, cause you just might get it,
Relapse has to be his 'worst' album in my opinion. Yet i still quite like that too
Encore may be the worst of his (almost all filler tracks while relapse was an attempt at SOMETHING). I agree with Billy though, Puke is a great track haha.
